channel.title: Breastfeeding on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space
channel.description: Recent content in Breastfeeding on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space

item.title: Why Breastfeeding vs Formula is just like Tabs vs Spaces
item.description: For the first month of my baby’s life, I struggled through the whole breastfeeding thing. I don’t want to go into too much details, so some bullet points of events/struggles: The baby was born early (but full term), so he was very sleepy, preferred sleeping over eating. He wasn’t latching on correctly (although, he was always too sleepy to actually tell if he had a good latch or not).
